text: thumb These are the Billboard Hot 100 number-one singles of 1969. That year, 8 acts hit number one for the first time, such as Sly & the Family Stone, The 5th Dimension, Billy Preston, Henry Mancini, Zager and Evans, The Archies, Steam, and Peter, Paul and Mary. The Beatles and The 5th Dimension were the only acts to have more than one song hit number one, with each having two. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |+Key |style="background- color:#FFFF99"|The yellow background indicates the #1 song on Billboard's 1969 Year-End Chart of Pop Singles. |} {| class="wikitable" ! width=31| !Issue date !Song !Artist(s) !Reference |- |
